item.description:
Our next meeting will be on August 27, Wednesday at 7pm.
We'll discuss "Your Erroneous Zones" by Dr. Wayne Dyer.
Also we'll talk about the concepts in "A New Earth" by Eckhart Tolle.
Our group members love to discuss the concepts from "A New Earth" at each meeting.
Management of Borders in Shrewsbury MA provide tables and chairs for our meetings.
We bring our drinks or get one from Seattles's Best Coffee in the store.
We look forward for the next meeting. There is always interesting discussions and views to share.
You'll love it:)
item.how_to_find_us: Our table is at the World History Section.
item.why: You'll love it because we are open to different ideas, views, suggestions. We choose "the book of the month" together. It can be any book that we think worth to read. There is always fun and lots of positive energy in our group meetings.
item.name: August Meetup
